column2: title=The Uncharted Realms of Tolkien: A Critical Study of Text, Context and Subtext in the Works of JRR Tolkien

column1: '''''The Uncharted Realms of Tolkien''''' is a book focusing on literary criticism of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s works.
*Realms of Ecology: Tolkien and the Physical Universe
*[http://www.alt-tolkien.com/r27uncharted.html Review by Martin Baker on Middle-earth Reunion: the Alternative Tolkien Society]
